Battery
=======


:navy:`type`
~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. container::

   .. table::
       :class: tight-table
       :widths: 45 45 15

       +----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+----------------+
       | **type**                                     | **Description**                               | **Example**    |
       +==============================================+===============================================+================+
       | **Required**: :blue:`False`                  | Description of battery type.                  | pb-acid gel    |
       |                                              |                                               | cell           |
       | **Units**: None                              |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Type**: string                             |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Style**: name                              |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Default**: None                            |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       +----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+----------------+

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

       :class: tight-table

       +----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+----------------+
       | **voltage.start**                            | **Description**                               | **Example**    |
       +==============================================+===============================================+================+
       | **Required**: :blue:`False`                  | Starting value of a diagnostic measurement.   | 12.3           |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Units**: None                              |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Type**: float                              |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Style**: number                            |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       | **Default**: None                            |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
       |                                              |                                               |                |
